member.name: M:WxScanAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:WxScanAPI.Common.RedPack.CorpPay(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 企业付款(请求需要双向证书) 企业付款业务是基于微信支付商户平台的资金管理能力，为了协助商户方便地实现企业向个人付款， 针对部分有开发能力的商户，提供通过API完成企业付款的功能。 比如目前的保险行业向客户退保、给付、理赔。 企业付款将使用商户的可用余额，需确保可用余额充足。查看可用余额、充值、提现请登录商户平台“资金管理”进行操作。https://pay.weixin.qq.com/ 注意：与商户微信支付收款资金并非同一账户，需要单独充值。

member.summary: 调用ExecuteReader,通过提供CommandBehavior.

If we created and opened the connection, we want the connection to be closed when the DataReader is closed.
If the caller provided the connection, we want to leave it to them to manage.
